entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Dryden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:50 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dryden Airport 9:57 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.7°C
Wind: S 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or flurries. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 6:25 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 6:25 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:25 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
